events.message: Customer submitted a claim after a car collision that occurred downtown on April 30th.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to reported vehicle collision details.
An agent from the auto claims department has been assigned to assist the customer promptly.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the customer was notified of the next steps.
Customer requested to submit vehicle damage photos and police accident report for review.
The customer has uploaded pictures of the damaged car and the official police report.
Claim investigation commenced to verify collision details and assess vehicle damage.
Investigation confirmed fault and validated all submitted documents related to the accident.
Settlement offer created based on approved damage estimates and policy coverage details.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and timely communication.
Approval granted for the settlement amount in accordance with policy limits.
Payment for the approved claim was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s bank account.
The auto accident claim has been closed following successful payment and resolution.
The claim file has been archived for record-keeping in the claims management system.
